fcb_fab_flexible_title: Fine-Pitch Printed Circuit Board Assembly Services IPC-A-610 Class 3 Compliant Under One Roof
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_title: Know About PCBONLINE PCB Assembly Services
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_zero: PCBONLINE provides one-stop PCB assembly services for aerospace, defense, medical, industrial, automotive, communications, and consumer electronics. From PCB prototype assembly to batch PCBA manufacturing, component procurement, and end-product assembly, all in one-stop solution is offered. PCBONLINE has 0.35mm finest pitch assembly and 01005 SMD assembly capabilities.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_one: PCBONLINE PCB assembly services strictly follow IPC-A-610 Class 3 standards and offer the highest cost-effectiveness. Since 1999, PCBONLINE has been dedicated to providing PCB assembly services to clients around the globe with the highest quality in the fastest delivery.
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_word_: • PCB assembly is the process of mounting electrical parts on pre-manufactured printed circuit boards.
• PCB assembly services require close cooperation between the assembly house and its clients.
• The PCB assembly house provides PCB fabrication, SMT stencils, component procurement, PCB assembly, and PCBA shipping.
• Basic materials that PCBA clients provide are BOM (bill of materials), Gerber files, pick and place file.
• The complete PCB assembly services include PCBA sample manufacturing, first article inspection, and mass PCBA manufacturing.
• Basic steps of PCB assembly include SMT assembly, SPI, reflow soldering, AOI, PTH assembly, wave soldering.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_title: Strengths of PCB Assembly Services at PCBONLINE
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_one: • Have 30 mature SMT and THT lines equipped with Panasonic and Yamaha SMT machines, 3D SPI, X-ray, lead-free reflow soldering ovens, 3D AOI, German Ersa selective wave soldering machines, etc.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_two: • ≤0.5mm fine pitch assembly, Min component size 01005 (0.4mm×0.2mm), Min board size 50mm×50mm, Max board size 1200mm×370mm, PCB thickness 0.3mm to 4mm.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_three: • Solutions experts provide free one-on-one engineering support and considerate services (DFX).
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_four: • Provide free complete PCBA samples, functional testing, and discounts to ≥$5,000 orders.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_five: • IPC-A-610 Class 3 quality and ISO quality management system. You can refer to our PCB assembly manufacturing level from the image on the right.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_six: • Source passive and active components for PCB assembly at bulk pricing from reliable electrical part suppliers and has its own component warehouse.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_seven: • Have rich PCBA manufacturing experience, especially for complex PCB assembly such as thermal pads, vias-in-pad, fine-pitch BGAs, right angles at pads, etc.

fcb_fab_flexible_related_title: Other Users Are Also Getting a Quote to Related Assembly Solutions
fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: Usually if you have fewer than 3,000 pieces of PCB that need assembling, you will need low volume PCB assembly service. Quick PCB assembly, good soldering, and fast delivery are guaranteed.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: High volume PCB assembly refers to a large quantity of printed circuit board assemblies of 10,000 pieces or more, including DFM checking and DFT checking.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_multilayer_word: Have all the components and the printed circuit boards but don't know how to solder them into the PCBA? You can get wonderful consigned PCB assembly service here.
